message.body:
I know I have 4 months until Ryans 1st bday but I'm looking for a bubble guppies cake. One sheet cake and then either a smaller one or like a giant cupcake for him to smash.
Would you be able to do something like this?

Yea I haven't done a full sheet cake yet, only half sheet which is like 13x19 I think (full sheet cakes are larger than the oven)... let me know if you want a full sheet cake and I'll look into it but as far as design goes I can a bubble guppies theme and a giant cupcake for him too

I don't need a full sheet cake we are doing a smaller party and going on vacation instead. Once I know how many people I'll let you know.
He loves the bubble guppies my super hero theme will have to wait a few more years lol
Ok yea just let me know and lol the time will come haha
I was gonna put him in a cape and all haha
Ahaha!! That would have been cute.. maybe next year
I'll dress him up for Halloween. Haha this poor kid
